name: Vikalp Foundation

address: Care of Lata Balu Duble , B-18, CEN-221, Shiv Darshan, Anna Bhau Sathe Nagar,, V. J. Bhosale Marg,

briefDescription: Vikalp Foundation is a registered trust working in the sectors of health, education and livelihood. It operates in Mumbai. The organization works towards the socio economic upliftment for the underprivileged population. It provides vocational training to women and youth, imparts non formal education to children and also provides medical assistance to the needy people.

address: C/o Lata Balu Duble, B-18, CEN-221, Shiv Darshan, Anna Bhau Sathe Nagar,, V. J. Bhosale Marg,
